org.apache.river.test.share

Class LeaseGrantTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
        • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseGrantTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeaseUsesTestBase

    public abstract class LeaseGrantTestBase
extends TestBase
implements Test
    Base class for tests which grab a lease and make sure the returned lease meets give constraints.

    • Field Detail

      • durationRequest

        protected volatile long durationRequest
        The length of time the lease should be asked for.

      • expirationRequest

        protected volatile long expirationRequest
        The expiration time that would be given for the duration request on the most recent use. Not used if durationRequest is Lease.ANY.
        See Also:
        resourceRequested()

      • requestStart

        protected volatile long requestStart
        The local time just after the request. expirationRequest is requestStart + durationRequest.
        See Also:
        resourceRequested()

      • clip

        protected volatile long clip
        The length of time that leases get cliped to if they are too long. A negative value indicates no cliping is expected

      • slop

        protected volatile long slop

    • Constructor Detail

      • withinSlop

        protected boolean withinSlop(long duration,
                             long value)
        Return true if the duration is within the allowed slop range relative to the given value.

      • logRequest

        protected void logRequest(String type,
                          net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease)
        Log a requested lease and its result, for the given type of lease.

      • resourceRequested

        protected void resourceRequested()
        Should be called immediately after a leased resource is requested or renewed. Sets up relevant state, namely requestStart and expirationRequest.
        See Also:
        requestStart, expirationRequest

      • parse

        protected void parse()
              throws Exception
        Parse the command line options argv[] is parsed to control various options
        -exact
        Sets the test to fail if exact leases are not granted, defaults to false. If this option is not set tests will pass if the returned lease is less than or equal to what was expected.
        -duration
        Length of time to request lease for. Defaults to 20 seconds. The string "forever" is interpreted as Lease.FOREVER. "anylength" is interpreted as Lease.ANY.
        -clip
        If set to a non-negative value and -duration is larger than -clip a lease of duration of -clip will not be considered an error. Defaults to -1.
        -slop milliseconds
        Set how tolerant test is of clock drift and network delays. Defaults to 1000ms.
        Overrides:
        parse in class TestBase
        Throws:
        Exception

      • prep

        protected void prep(int serviceIndex)
             throws TestException
        Makes sure the designated service is activated by getting its admin
        Throws:
        TestException
